item.title: Equipment Stats Interface
item.dc:creator: @Divini Divini
item.description:
@Divini wrote:

Well, i made a command. When you type it, the interface for the equipment stats opens up and shows my bonuses and armor, but i cant get it to show my armor that im wearing. It shows a normal character with no armor? Is there a way i can fix that?

Here is the command:

} if(command.startsWith("stats")){ showInterface(15106); sendFrame126("Stab: +"+playerBonus[0]+"",15113); sendFrame126("Slash: +"+playerBonus[1]+"",15114); sendFrame126("Crush: +"+playerBonus[2]+"",15115); sendFrame126("Mage: +"+playerBonus[3]+"",15116); sendFrame126("Range: +"+playerBonus[4]+"",15117); sendFrame126("Stab: +"+playerBonus[5]+"",15118); sendFrame126("Slash: +"+playerBonus[6]+"",15119); sendFrame126("Crush: +"+playerBonus[7]+"",15120); sendFrame126("Mage: +"+playerBonus[8]+"",15121); sendFrame126("Range: +"+playerBonus[9]+"",15122); sendFrame126("Strength: +"+playerBonus[10]+"",15123); sendFrame126("Prayer: +"+playerBonus[11]+"",15124); updateRequired = true;

Here is a picture:

Thanks!

Read full topic
